titleStmt.title: Grant Green to James F. Robinson
CWG8785

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Commonwealth of Ky
Vs
W. S. Darnaby & Paul Rankins Admrs of L. B. Dickenson desd Late Clerk of the Scott County Court & P Thompson and Paul Rankins.

His Excellency
James. F. Robinson, Governor Ky
Sir
In the above case the principal Interest and Cost has been paid in full. A remission of the Damages is asked for.

Respectfully
Grant Green
Audr
Frankfort.
April. 9. 1863

Franklin Cir. Ct.
$164.41 } Damages
Admrs of S. B. Dickenson decd
Late Clerk South Co. Ct.
Issd April 9th 1863
